subject: Automobile Racing
Automobiles
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Nascar’s intention was to build a safer car that also promoted close racing and helped keep costs under control by requiring fewer different cars for a variety of racetrack configurations.
snippet: Nascar’s intention was to build a safer car that also promoted close racing and helped keep costs under control by requiring fewer different cars for a variety of racetrack configurations.
